definition: end/extremity/item/port/to hold sth level with both hands/to carry/regular

sentences.english: He thinks they behave impudently and always ask for trouble.
sentences.chinese: 以为高加索人举止粗鲁，常寻事端。

sentences.english: The police moved the crowd on before it could get big enough to threat law and order.
sentences.chinese: 警察赶走了人群，以防聚集太多而滋生事端。

sentences.english: What makes viruses dangerous is the ability to perform an event.
sentences.chinese: 计算机病毒之所以危险，是因为它们可以制造事端。

sentences.english: Patty is hesitant because it may lead to other things.
sentences.chinese: 派蒂感到犹疑，因为这也许会引致其它的事端。

sentences.english: They created incidents and committed outrages against Chinese nationals.
sentences.chinese: 他们制造事端残醋迫害华侨。

sentences.english: It seemed that the papers were trying to stir it up, rubbishing him, blaming him.
sentences.chinese: 但看起来媒体总是想搅起事端，诋毁他，责备他。

sentences.english: provoked the situation and doubled its mistakes, causing further escalation.
sentences.chinese: 日方挑起事端，又错上加错，导致事态进一步升级。

sentences.english: China should stop escalation of discontentment on South China Sea.
sentences.chinese: 中国应该停止升级在南海上的事端。

sentences.english: It is only Satan who creates a problem between people.
sentences.chinese: 是魔鬼在人们之间制造事端。

sentences.english: The one who mainly cause the trouble in South East Sea is china.
sentences.chinese: 在南海挑举事端的祸首祸首即是中国。

sentences.english: It is Japan that provoked the issue and made mistakes one after another that led to the escalation.
sentences.chinese: 是日方挑起事端，一错再错，导致事态升级。

sentences.english: The guilty is those evil of be made.
sentences.chinese: 有罪的是那些制造事端的罪恶。

sentences.english: He launched the cold war arms race in 1948.
sentences.chinese: 1948年他挑起了冷战军备竞赛的事端。

sentences.english: This time, scientists believe a sun-baked glacier is stirring up trouble.
sentences.chinese: 这个时候，科学家相信太阳烤冰川是挑起事端。

sentences.english: The fourth-rate wife gossips and makes trouble.
sentences.chinese: 劣等太太，搬是弄非，制造事端。

definition: a new branch grows out of a knot (idiom); fig. side issues keep arising
branches and knots/fig. side issue/minor peripheral problem
variant of 內訌|内讧[nei4 hong4]
